meanings.definition: A quilt that can be folded or rolled up to form a pillow.
meanings.sent1: I love snuggling with my quillow on the couch.
meanings.sent2: She packed her quillow for the sleepover.
meanings.sent3: The quillow looked like a regular blanket until it magically turned into a pillow!
meanings.sent4: Her quillow was a cozy cocoon of warmth.
meanings.sent5: The quillow's softness made it the perfect nap companion.

meanings.definition: To fold or roll up a quilt to form a pillow.
meanings.sent1: I always quillow my blanket before storing it.
meanings.sent2: She quillowed the quilt neatly for easy storage.
meanings.sent3: He quillowed the quilt so expertly, it looked like a professional job!
meanings.sent4: The magician quillowed the quilt in one swift motion.
meanings.sent5: Quillowing the quilt transformed it into a convenient pillow in seconds.
